__TOC__

Are you Egyptian? Also want to join us! If you wish to contribute to the advancement of the Egyptian team of Ubuntu users, it's easy! Join our growing mailing list, if you have not already! We would like to hear what you have to say, your ideas, proposals, suggestions, how do you think that Ubuntu Linux can be better supported and enacted in Egypt?
Watch for yourself our mailing list: Ubuntu-eg members .

(Communication in the list bilingual: Arabic, English).

== The new guide ==

The new guide is a document to read for any prospective member.

Downloads: The Beginner's Guide (PDF)
